overview: Kory Carter grew up in a conservative household where he was taught that sex was sacred...but only after marriage. When Kory realized he was gay, he knew things would be different for him, but he wasn't different. He wanted to uphold the same ideals he was taught. The fact that he's waiting for marriage makes dating in the gay community difficult. Lucky for Kory, he's found Sean Watt, a patient, loving guy who's willing to wait.
title: Be Ready
